data.title: Amazing!!
data.text: We arrived early in the day and my son enjoyed a mostly empty play area.  This was a great thing as he is working on pushing through his fears.  They have ramps, tramps, jumps and an amazing slide area for sliding on blankets or skateboards and scooters.  They are exceptionally gifted at getting kids engaged and Nemo (Ryan) was completely amazing.  We spent 2 hours in the play area and I was thoroughly impressed.  Can't say more!  Go!

data.title: Awesome!
data.text: Great place to take the kids specially if they're into extreme sports. They have ramps, trampolines, jumps and they provide skateboards,  snowboards protective gear and everything you need for the action. Good fun for all.

data.title: Get better in a safe environment
data.text: No snow in early December, so I went to Progresh to work on spins and rail for the upcoming snowboarding season.  After a quick intro tour from Tyler, I was able to use the trampolines with a jib board to practice grabs and rotations.  I wish I lived closer and could use this as a way to safely progress park tricks.  Great for snowboarding, skiing, wakeboarding, BMX, skateboarding and more!  Check it out!
